title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 64.2 - Withdrawals from public and private bonded warehouses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 64.2 - Withdrawals from public and private bonded warehouses

State Regulations
(a) Public bonded warehouses must obtain form
MT-321.1 in duplicate from all persons desiring to withdraw alcoholic beverages
from bond. A resident of this State must be registered as a distributor or
submit a receipt showing that the New York State tax has been paid, before the
warehouse may permit the withdrawal of alcoholic beverages. One copy of form
MT-321.1 must be signed by the warehouse company. A summary of all withdrawals
from bond for the calendar month (form MT-321.2) must be prepared by the public
bonded warehouse and the signed copies of the forms MT-321.1 are to be attached
to form MT-321.2 and sent to the New York State Department of Taxation and

Finance, Miscellaneous Tax, W.A. Harriman Campus, Albany, NY 12227, on or
before the 15th day of the month following the month in which the withdrawals
were made. (b) Distributors who
operate their own private bonded warehouses must also prepare form MT-321.1 in
duplicate for each withdrawal from bond. A summary of all withdrawals from bond
for the calendar month (form MT-321.2) must be prepared by the distributors and
the signed copies of the forms MT-321.1 are to be attached to the form MT-321.2
and sent to the New York State Department of Taxation and Finance, Miscellaneous Tax, W.A. Harriman Campus, Albany, NY 12227, on or before the
15th day of the month following the month in which the withdrawals were
made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
64.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
